title: Node configuration file
description: A schema file that describes an individual node that is part of a cluster.

name.title: Node name
name.description: The name of the node that this configuration adds. A name must be unique among all of the node configurations that are loaded

ip.title: IP or Hostname
ip.description: The IP or the hostname at which the C-Troll application can reach the Tray configured through this configuration file

port.title: Port
port.description: The port on which the Tray at the provided IP/hostname is listening for connections

secret.title: Secret
secret.description: A secret message that is sent with all connections to the configured node. If the Tray has been configured to require a secret, this must be the same as the secret in the Tray's configuration

description.title: Description
description.description: A human-readable description of the node. This information is not used directly, but presented to the user instead
